official_title: A bill to amend titles 10 and 37, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of Transportation to increase the term of service in the armed forces under their jurisdiction and to pay bonuses for enlistment and reenlistment in the Reserve components.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretaries of Defense and Transportation to extend from six years to six to eight years the term of service in the armed forces under their jurisdiction. Permits the payment of enlistment and reenlistment bonuses for elements of the Ready Reserve other than the Selected Reserve.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles 10 and 37, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of Transportation to increase the term of service in the armed forces under their jurisdiction and to pay bonuses for enlistment and reenlistment in the Reserve components.
